section.title: Non-linear Reservoir Approaches
section.para: Outlined in this section will be non-linear reservoir techniques that have been applied in Australia. The discussion will include the theory behind the model together with the implementation of that theory in different software packages; the purpose being not one of recommending those software packages but rather showing the alternative methods for implementing the approaches. Both urban and rural implementations will be considered. Hence a discussion of the inherent assumptions for the alternative situations will be necessary.
